biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.repository
Interface AssociationRoleRepository

All Superinterfaces:
GenericRepository<AssociationRole,java.lang.Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssociationRoleRepositoryImpl
public interface AssociationRoleRepository
extends GenericRepository<AssociationRole,java.lang.Long>

AssociationRoleReposotory defines the repository interface for AssociationRoles

Author:
Matthias Neubauer

retrieveRolesPlayedOf

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveRolesPlayedOf(Connectable c,
                                                      Scope scope)
get AssociationRoles of a given Connectable (that means where Connectable is a player within the AssociationRole)

Parameters:
c - given Connectable
Returns:
a List of AssociationRoles where Connectable c is a player, an empty List if none exist

Parameters:

Returns:

retrieveCounterpartConnectables

java.util.List<Connectable> retrieveCounterpartConnectables(Association a,
                                                            Connectable givenCon)
retrieve counterpart Connectables of a given Connectable within a given Association. Note: if an Association contains the same Connectable multiple times, the Connectable will not be returned

Parameters:
a - given Association
givenCon - given Connectable
Returns:
returns a Set of counterpart connectables, an empty set if none exist for the given parameter

retrieveCounterpartConnectables

                                                            java.lang.String givenAssocRoleType,
                                                            Scope scope)
retrieve counterpart Connectables of a given Connectable within a given scope where only the role type name of the connectable is known

Parameters:
givenCon - given Connectable
givenAssocRoleType - given Connectable's role type name
scope - the current scope which determines if a certain association is visible or not.
Returns:
returns a Set of counterpart connectables, an empty set if none exist for the given parameter

retrieveCounterpartAssociationRoles

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveCounterpartAssociationRoles(Association a,
                                                                    Connectable givenCon)
retrieve counterpart AssociationRoles of a given Connectable within a given Association. Note: if an Association contains the same Connectable multiple times, the Connectable (in its roles) will not be returned

Parameters:
a - given Association
givenCon - given Connectable
Returns:
returns a Set of counterpart AssociationRoles, an empty set if none exist for the given parameter

retrieveCounterpartAssociationRoles

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveCounterpartAssociationRoles(Connectable givenCon,
                                                                    java.lang.String givenAssocRoleType,
                                                                    Scope scope)
retrieve counterpart roles of a given Connectable within a given scope where only the role type name of the connectable is known

Parameters:
givenCon - given Connectable
givenAssocRoleType - given Connectable's role type name
scope - the current scope which determines if a certain association is visible or not (and hence the roles)
Returns:
returns a Set of counterpart AssociationRoles, an empty set if none exist for the given parameter

retrieveAssociationsOfType

java.util.List<Association> retrieveAssociationsOfType(java.lang.String assocType,
                                                       Connectable c,
                                                       Scope scope)
retrieve associations for a given Connectable, which are of a certain Association type

Parameters:
assocType - AssociationType
c - Connectable for which associations of the given type will be searched
scope - the current scope which determes if a certain association is visible (and hence the visibility of the roles)
Returns:
a List of Associations

retrieveAssociationRolesBy

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveAssociationRolesBy(AssocType assocType,
                                                           Connectable c,
                                                           java.lang.String assocRoleTypePlayed,
                                                           Scope scope)
retrieve AssociationRoles by a given AssociationType, a given Connectable and the AssociationRole type which is taken by the Connectable within the association

Parameters:
assocType - given AssociationType
c - given Connectable
assocRoleTypePlayed - given AssociationRole type
scope - the current scope which determes if a certain association is visible (and hence the visibility of the roles)
Returns:
returns all AssociationRoles of existing associations of the given type, whereas Connectable is a player within the association and the AssociationRole is of the given type

                                                           Scope scope)

Parameters:
assocRoleType - given AssociationRole type
scope - the current scope which determes if a certain association is visible (and hence the visibility of the roles)
Returns:
a List of AssociationRoles which reference the given AssociationRole type

retrieveAssociationRolesBy

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveAssociationRolesBy(Connectable c,
                                                           Association a)
retrieve AssociationRoles by a given Connectable and a given Association.

Parameters:
c - given Connectable
a - given Association
Returns:
a List of AssociationRoles which belong to the given Association and have a reference to the given player, an empty list if none exist

retrieveAssociationRolesBy

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveAssociationRolesBy(Connectable c,
                                                           java.lang.String arType,
                                                           Association a)
retrieve AssociationRoles by a given Connectable, its role type and a given Association.

Parameters:
c - given Connectable
arType - AssociationRole type of the AssociationRole which links c and a
a - given Association
Returns:
a List of AssociationRoles which belong to the given Association and have a reference to the given player, an empty list if none exist

retrieveAssociationRolesBy

java.util.List<AssociationRole> retrieveAssociationRolesBy(Association a,
                                                           AssociationRole ar)
retrieve AssociationRoles by a given Association and a given Role

Parameters:
a - given Association
ar - given AssociationRole
Returns:
returns in fact the given AssociationRole if the given Association contains it, otherwise an empty set
